name: weHike
description: weHike is an interactive Web Application that allows you to store existing hiking trails and create your own on an interactive 3D map. weHike allows uploading images to your map displaying them exactly where your photos were taken. With those features, you can create your own personalized hiking trails or create a journey of hikes with photos.

name: E-Commerce
description: E-Commerce built using StoreFront API by Shopify. StoreFront provides all the security that Shopify offers at the moment of making a purchase with the flexibility of creating your own Front-End

name: Coursera Copy
description: A copy of the learning Platform Coursera. Built using Nextjs and TypeScript, this project allows the user to browse over all the modules of a course

name: Data Automation
description: Python script that automates the fetching of public exam results from a Universityâ€™s website. Obtained more than 500k rows of raw data. After that, I had to clean the data and save it into a database on a Google Cloud Virtual machine using Docker and Postgresql. In the end, I was able to analyze the data and get some insights from it.

name: Inventory API
description: Creation of an inventory system that allows to create inventory, batches, orders with client information, items from inventory, user, etc. As well as the creation of API's that fetch that information from a Postgresql Database

name: Web-Site
description: You are in this project right now! Still Work in Progress
